title: Permanently Suspended?
body: My account has been banned, but I have not gotten any emails (checked spam and trash as well) saying why. I'm so confused. I have been playing on this account since season 2.

replies.body: Heya, looks like a protective lock was put on the account due to suspicious activity.  Reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to help fix this up.
